title: Radio Alhara, Sonic Space, Beyond Palestine w/ Elias & Yousef Anastas
dc:creator: René Boer
description: For Breezeblock #18, FA organiser René Boer talks to the founders of Radio Alhara, architects Elias and Yousef Anastas, on the one year anniversary of their radio project. It was launched in Bethlehem at the start of the global lockdown and by now has become a sonic public space reaching well beyond the confines of Palestine.
